events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I am very disappointed. The jacket does not fit as expected and I would like to know how to return it and get a refund.
The system has automatically categorized this issue under the Refund cluster based on keywords in the customer's message.
Your request has been assigned to one of our customer support specialists who will assist you shortly with your refund inquiry.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand that you want to return your jacket and get a refund. I'm here to help you with that process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you wish to return the jacket? This will help us process your refund quickly.
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is too small and doesn't match the size chart on your website, so I need to return it and get my money back.
Thank you for the details. You are eligible for a full refund. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the prepaid label; it makes the return easier.
We have emailed you the prepaid return label and instructions. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be processed immediately.
Just checking in to confirm if you were able to send the jacket back and if everything is okay with the refund process so far.
Yes, I shipped the jacket last week and have received the refund. Thank you for the smooth process and assistance.
Your case is now closed since the refund was successfully completed. Please contact us again if you need any further help.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey via email. Your feedback is important to help us improve our service.
